title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", but it changes with settings.
OB: When clicking on "OK" and then reopening the hyperlink builder, the actual result is that its title becomes "www.actuate.com" instead of "Hyperlink Options".
EB: The expected result is that the title of the hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options" regardless of the settings.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Set a label hyperlink as "www.actuate.com". 
2. Click on "OK". 
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
